original_text: This is that Benaiah, who was mighty among the thirty, and above the thirty: and in his course was Ammizabad his son.
korean_text: 이 브나야는 삼십 명 중에 용사요 삼십 명 위에 있으며 그의 반 중에 그의 아들 암미사밧이 있으며

sentences.original_text: who was mighty among the thirty
and in his course was Ammizabad his son
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 반열에는 그의 아들 암미사반이 있었다
